name: Coconut Cove Hair & Body Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: What it is:A fresh fragrance for your hair and body with notes of coconut, jasmine, and bergamot..Fragrance Family:Fresh.Scent Type:Fresh Solar.Key Notes:Bergamot, Coconut, Ambrox.Fragrance Description:This is a dreamy fine fragrance for your hair and body to spritz wherever life takes you. Coconut Cove is a creamy and exotic blend of coconut, jasmine, and gardenia floral notes for an intoxicating, yet tranquil blend..About the Bottle:The Skylar Hair and Body Mist is a lightweight plastic bottle made with 30% recycled materials. A portable and convenient size to take with you on-the-go. All Skylar bottles and caps are 100% recyclable..About the Fragrance:Skylar was founded by ‘mompreneur’ Cat Chen after her daughter’s allergic reaction to her perfume. Dreamy Skylar fragrances are safe for you and safe for everyone around you. They are vegan, cruelty-free, hypoallergenic, and sensitive-skin safe.
ingredients: Organic sugar cane alcohol, Aqua/Water, 1,3-Benzodioxole-5-carboxaldehyde, 1,4-Dioxacycloheptadecane-5,17-dione, 1,6-Nonadien-3-ol, 3,7-dimethyl-, 1,6-Octadien-3-ol, 3,7-dimethyl-, 3-acetate, 2(3H)-Furanone, dihydro-5-pentyl- , 2(3H)-Furanone, dihydro-5-propyl-), 2-Hexene, 6,6-dimethoxy-2,5,5-trimethyl, 2h-Pyran-4-ol, tetrahydro-4-methyl-2-(2-methylpropyl), Benzaldehyde, 4-hydroxy-3-methoxy, Benzoic acid, 2-hydroxy-, (3Z)-3-hexen-1-yl ester, Benzoic acid, 2-hydroxy-, pentyl ester, Cyclohexanemethanol, .alpha.,.alpha.,4-trimethyl-, acetate, Cyclohexanemethanol, 4-(1-methylethyl)-, cis, Cyclohexanepropanol, .alpha.,.alpha.-dimethyl, Cyclohexanepropanol, 2,2,6-trimethyl-.alpha.-propyl, Cyclopentaneacetic acid, 3-oxo-2-pentyl-, methyl ester (floral note / safe synthetic), Oxacyclohexadec-12-en-2-one, (12E), Propanol, oxybis, Tetradecanoic acid, 1-methylethyl ester, Betaine, Panthenol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz safely on hair, skin, and cotton or polyester fabrics..-Layer multiple Skylar fragrances together to create different possibilities and give your fragrance maximum impact...Recycling Instructions:.-This bottle and cap are 100% recyclable. When bottle is empty, remove cap and pump and wash thoroughly. .-Recycle the bottle and cap and place pump in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I truthfully love this stuff. I only use it as a hair mist, alongside my favorite coconut perfume (Lily of The Beach, Clinique).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fades super quickly and starts to smell funny once its settled. The perfume is better
